texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you've used newer versions of Horde with Plesk, you have probably noticed the news feed that runs down the left side of the screen. Depending on the types of e-mails you receive, you may get some pretty odd news popping up on the screen.
texts.text: If you've used newer versions of Horde with Plesk, you have probably noticed the news feed that runs down the left side of the screen. Depending on the types of e-mails you receive, you may get some pretty odd news popping up on the screen.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Luckily, you can remove the news feeds pretty easily. Open the following file in your favorite text editor:
texts.text: Luckily, you can remove the news feeds pretty easily. Open the following file in your favorite text editor:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Once the file is open, drop down to line 102 and comment out the entire if() statement (lines 102-117).
texts.text: Once the file is open, drop down to line 102 and comment out the entire if() statement (lines 102-117).

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: NOTE:  If you upgrade Plesk, this change will most likely be reversed.
texts.text: NOTE:  If you upgrade Plesk, this change will most likely be reversed.
